content:
As promised, here's a quick survey that we could distribute to the entire community. It asks everyone to rate target FMM levels for every STU3 resource they care about, and then separately asks which resources the respondent is personally involved with in workgroups:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/12GVflt2GLprr8E3_8dppkxBZXqTg2n_zdaWzo6qtags/viewform

Re: survey repeating "Sequence" twice: it appears twice in the aphabetical list (not directly link-able, so you'll have to click through on the "Alphabetical" tab) at http://hl7-fhir.github.io/resourcelist
Is there any way we can get Privacy Consent Directive IG on this prioritization list? I fear it is already not visible enough being an IG vs a proper Resource.
Do we apply FMM levels to implementation guides?
yes. also to xml and json forms, and more generally to anything people implement
We don't have criteria for maturity levels for anything other than resources yet, but we're working towards that.
OK -- I ask because I don't see FMM levels on http://hl7-fhir.github.io/pcd/consentdirective.html

I can assure you that the FMM of consent directive should be zero. the committee needs motivated membership to make constructive progress. Lately the focus has been on finding a perfect model for Contract. --- This is why I wanted it in the FMM survey. To get it some visibility, or to have the community confirm their lack of interest.
